text: Hagi Deviti'a Anumzamofona amanage huno asami'ne, Nagra huge'za vahera hampri'zage'na, nagra kagri kavurera tusi'a kefo navu'nava hu'na kumira hu'noe. Hianagi sipisipi afu'mo'ma hiaza huno ama vahe'mokizmia hazenkezmia omane'ne. Zamagra nahazenke hu'naze? Ra Anumzamoka karimpahezana atregeno nagrite'ene naganire'ene eno. Hianagi ama vaheka'a mago hazenkea osu'nazanki zamahe ofrio.
